conducting_body: Satyajit Ray Film & Television Institute, Kolkata

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
JET Exam 2023 - FTII Pune will likely declare the FTII JET 2023 result in June. Earlier, the institution had released the JET 2023 admit card on March 27. Candidates could download their FTII JET hall ticket by using their login credentials at ftii.ac.in. The JET entrance exam 2023 was conducted on April 6 and 7. The conducting body has closed the FTII JET application process on  March 17, 2024, in online mode. The FTII JET entrance exam is conducted every year to offer admission in various PG programmes in TV and Film wing, in institutions such as Film & Television Institute of India (FTII Pune) and Satyajit Ray Film &Television Institute (SRFTI Kolkata).

The exam of FTII JET 2023 was held in online mode. The FTII will declare the JET entrance result 2023 in online mode. No candidates were allowed to enter the exam centre without a valid FTII JET admit card 2023. Candidates who have secured a good score in the entrance will be required to appear in JET counselling session, which consists of a number of steps such as orientation, interview rounds, etc. Candidates are advised to go through the entire article to learn more about the FTII JET entrance test, eligibility, exam pattern, result, counselling, admission process and other important details.

highlights.value: Satyajit Ray Film & Television Institute, Kolkata

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
To appear in the entrance examination of FTII JET 2023, candidates must satisfy the JET eligibility criteria 2023 set by the institution. The JET 2023 eligibility criteria mentions the minimum qualification, necessary age and other specifications that candidates must match to be eligible for admission. Candidates will not be allowed to attempt the Joint Entrance Test (JET) if they fail to meet the requirement of JET eligibility criteria 2023. It must be noted that the JET 2023 eligibility criteria varies for Film wing and Television wing. Candidates can check the JET eligibility criteria 2023 in the table given below.

 JET Eligibility Criteria 2023 for Courses under the Television Wing Group

S. No 

Particulars 

Details 


Academic  details

Candidates from any stream can apply for admission to any given course apart from Art Direction & Production Design and Sound Recording & Sound Design.

2.

JET eligibility criteria 2023 for Sound Recording & Television Engineering/ Sound for Electronic and Digital Media

Candidates must have a graduation degree in any discipline and they also must have studied Physics in Senior Secondary (10+2) level. 

JET Eligibility Criteria 2023 for Courses under the Film Wing Group 

S.No 

Particulars 

Details 


Academic  details

Candidates from any stream can apply for admission to any given course apart from Art Direction & Production Design and Sound Recording & Sound Design.

     2. 

Eligibility criteria of JET 2023 for Sound Recording & Sound Design

Candidates must have graduated from any stream are eligible to apply. However, they also must have studied Physics in Senior Secondary (10+2) level.

    3. 

JET 2023 eligibility criteria for Art Direction  & Production Design


Candidate must have completed their graduation in one of the fields mentioned below from a recognised university: 

Architecture

Painting

Sculpture 

Interior design or related fields in fine art 

Applied Science 

Candidates with an equivalent diploma in the given field are also eligible to sit in the JET 2023.

        

Note: Candidates who are awaiting their results or are attending the final year of their graduation are also eligible to register for JET 2023. After qualifying the exam, such candidates will need to submit their passing certificate to get admission in the university.

application_process.html_content:
The FTII Pune closed the JET application process 2023 on March 17, 2024. Before filling the application form of JET 2023, candidates were required to complete the FTII JET 2023 registration process by entering their personal details. After registering themselves, candidates could proceed to fill and submit the JET application form 2023. Candidates must ensure that all the necessary documents, personal and academic details mentioned in the JET 2023 application form are correct. Candidates must submit the JET application form 2023 before the submission deadline to avoid the rejection by the institution. To know how to fill the JET 2023 application form follow the steps given below.

Documents to keep ready before filling the JET Application Form

  • A valid Phone number

  • A valid email ID

  • Marksheet of Class 10th

  • Marksheet of Class 12th

  • Valid email ID and mobile number

  • Passbook 

  • Debit card/Credit card 

  • Net banking details 

Steps To Fill JET Application Form 2023

Candidates should follow the steps given below to fill the JET 2023 application form with ease:

Step 1: Go to the Official website - ftii.ac.in.

Step 2: Click on the 'Fresh candidate/ New log-in tab' for registration.

Step 3: Enter the required personal, academic and personal details.

Step 4: Now upload the necessary documents.

Step 5: Pay the JET 2023 application fee.

Step 6: Check the application form thoroughly to ensure that all the details are correct and then submit it. 

Step 7: Make multiple copies of JET application form 2023 for future reference.

admit_card.html_content: The JET 2023 admit card was made available online on March 27, 2024 for the exams held on April 6 and 7, 2024. Candidates should visit the official website and log in with their credentials to download it. It's important for candidates to download the JET hall ticket before the day of the exam. Upon downloading, they should carefully review all the details on the card, such as the candidate's name, roll number, photograph, category, assigned exam centre, exam date, and reporting time, for accuracy. If there are any errors, candidates need to promptly contact the admission committee for corrections. It's crucial to note that entry into the exam centre will be denied if candidates do not have their JET 2023 admit card and valid identification. Therefore, candidates must ensure they bring these documents when they go to take the Joint Entrance Test (JET) 2023. Additionally, retaining the admit card is important as it will be required during subsequent selection processes.

cutoffs.html_content:
The Film and Television Institute of India (FTII), Pune, will publish the JET 2023 cutoff marks on its official website following the declaration of the FTII JET 2023 results. To view the JET 2023 cutoff, candidates are advised to visit the FTII Pune’s official website where this important data is displayed. The JET cutoff for 2023 is essentially a benchmark, representing the minimum score candidates must achieve to be considered for admission into the postgraduate programmes offered by FTII. These cutoff marks play a significant role in the admission process, acting as a filter to shortlist eligible candidates.

Those who score equal to or above the JET 2023 cutoff will be eligible to progress to the subsequent stages of the selection process. It's important to note that the determination of the JET 2023 cutoff is influenced by several key factors. These include the overall number of candidates who appeared for the exam, the total number of seats available in various courses, the level of difficulty encountered in the entrance examination, and, importantly, the overall performance of candidates in the test.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Aspiring candidates who wish to qualify the entrance test with a good score must check the JET 2023 exam pattern to get an idea about the actual entrance exam. With the help of the JET exam pattern 2023, candidates can know about the structure and format of the exam. The JET 2023 exam pattern also helps candidates to get acquainted with the various key details regarding the entrance test such as mode, medium and duration of the exam, total marks, marking scheme and number of sections in the question paper. For more information about the JET exam pattern 2023 check out the table given below.

JET 2023 Exam Pattern

Particulars 

Details 

Type of questions 

Multiple Choice Questions
Subjective

Total marks 

100  

Sections 

There will be two sections

Section wise marks

Each section will be of 50 marks

Mode of exam 

Offline

Medium of exam

English

Exam duration

Three Hours (3 Hours)

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at JET Exam 2023 counselling
documents: Caste certificate in case of SC /ST/OBC (wherever applicable)

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for FTII JET exam 2023?
faqs.answer: Candidates were required to complete the JET registration by the deadline, March 17, 2024.

faqs.question: What do I need for FTII counselling sessions?
faqs.answer: Candidates are required to present these documents at the time of FTII JET counselling, such as Class 10, Class 12 and graduation marksheet, previous medical history certificate, category or disability certificate (if applicable) and a valid photo identity proof such as PAN card, passport, voter ID, Driving license, etc.

faqs.question: When will FTII JET 2023 result be out?
faqs.answer: The FTII Pune is expected to announce the FTII JET entrance 2024 result in June 2024, in online mode.

faqs.question: When will FTII JET exam be conducted?
faqs.answer: The FTII JET entrance exam 2023 was conducted on March 6 and 7, 2024.

faqs.question: When will FTII JET 2023 admit card be out?
faqs.answer: The FTII JET hall ticket 2023 was released on March 27 in online mode.

faqs.question: What is the admission process of FTII JET exam?
faqs.answer: The FTII JET admission is conducted in three steps: FTII JET entrance examination, orientation, audition (for acting candidates) and interview rounds.

faqs.question: What is the full marks in FTII JET 2023 exam?
faqs.answer: The FTII JET exam full marks is 100.

faqs.question: How can I apply for FTII registration 2023?
faqs.answer: Candidates could register for FTII JET 2023 by visiting the offciial website - ftii.ac.in.

faqs.question: When will FTII JET application process 2023 start?
faqs.answer: The FTII registration process 2023 started on February 18, 2024, in online mode, and it was closed on March 17, 2024.

exam_name: IIMC Entrance Exam - Indian Institute of Mass Communication Entrance Examination

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
IIMC Entrance Exam 2024 - Indian Institute of Mass Communication, has extended the IIMC registration 2024 till May 31 for Language Journalism courses (Urdu, Odia and Marathi). Candidates can register for the  IIMC 2024 language Journalism programmes till the last date. Indian Institute of Mass Communication has released the IIMC 2024 registration form for language Journalism programmes on February 1.  The IIMC 2024 entrance exam for language journalism programmes will be conducted on June 9.

The institution will declare the IIMC result 2024 for language journalism programmes on its official website. Applicants should check the IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 before applying for admissions. IIMC will offer admission to five diploma programmes which are the PG diploma in Journalism(English), Journalism (Hindi), Digital Media, Radio and TV Journalism (Bilingual - English and Hindi), and Advertising and Public Relations (Bilingual - English and Hindi) through CUET 2024 PG exam.

The IIMC application form 2024 for admission to PG diploma courses in Odia, Malayalam, Marathi and Urdu journalism courses has been released on the official website at iimc.gov.in. IIMC has released the IIMC entrance exam application form 2024 for language courses on its official website. Candidates will be selected for IIMC 2024 admission based on the marks obtained in the CUET 2024 conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA). Following the release of the NTA's merit list, the IIMC will hold centralized counselling sessions to help students choose their programme and centre of study. For some PG diploma admissions in journalism, IIMC will continue to hold its own entrance exam at various IIMC campuses and exam centres.

highlights.value: Indian Institute of Mass Communication Entrance Examination

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Candidates must meet the IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 to be eligible for admission to various programmes offered at the Indian Institute of Mass Communication. They are advised to check the IIMC 2024 eligibility criteria before starting the application process. The IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 mentions the academic qualification and other requirements that candidates have to meet to be considered eligible. Those candidates who fail to meet the IIMC 2024 eligibility criteria will have their application form rejected by the university. Applicants can check the IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 in the table given below. 

Nationality of Candidates

IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 also specifies the nationality of candidates who are eligible to sit for the entrance exam. 

    • Candidates who are Indian nationals are eligible to appear for the IIMC 2024 entrance exam.

    • There are five seats reserved for NRI sponsored candidates as well as NRIs in each course.

Educational Qualification

Candidates have to meet the prerequisite academic qualifications to register for IIMC 2024 entrance exam. The IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 also mentions the educational qualifications which candidates must satisfy are given below: 

    • Candidates still in the final year of their graduation are eligible to appear in the entrance exam. 

    • Candidates who have completed their graduation can also take the entrance test. 

Note: Candidates who are still in the final year of their graduation have to provide the original certificate issued by the institute or the college from where the candidate has last passed. The certificate must be submitted at IIMC before the submission deadline.

Age Criteria for Different Categories

As per the IIMC 2024 eligibility criteria, candidates of different categories will have to ensure that they meet the age criteria laid down by the authorities.   

            

S.No  

            

Category  

            

Age criteria        

            

1. 

            

SC/ST/PH             

        		            

Candidate should be born on August 1, 1991 or later

            

2.  

            

OBC

        		            

Candidate should be born on August 1, 1993 or later       

            

3.             

        		            

General             

        		            

Candidate should be born on August 1, 1996 or later      


Reservation of Seats for IIMC entrance exam qualified candidates 

At different campuses of IIMC, seats will be reserved for the candidates as per the guidelines set up by the government.

application_process.html_content:
For admission to the PG diploma in English, Hindi, advertising and public relations, digital media, radio and tv journalism offered by Indian Institute of Mass Communication, candidates must complete the IIMC registration 2024 and choice filling process before the deadline. The institute has released the separate IIMC application form 2024 for admission to language courses on the official website - iimc.gov.in. 

Only those candidates who meet the eligibility criteria can fill and submit the IIMC application form 2024. Candidates are required to enter their personal, academic details and upload the scanned image of necessary documents in the IIMC 2024 application form. After filling the application form, candidates have to remit the application fee via debit card/credit Card/net banking. The application fee differs for candidates depending upon the category they belong to. 

Steps to Fill Online IIMC Application Form 2024

Follow the steps given below to fill the online application form of IIMC 2024. 

  • Visit the official website of the university - iimc.admissions.nic.in.
  • Register yourself by using email ID.
  • After registration, proceed to fill the application form.
  • Enter the required academic, personal and contact details in the form.
  • Then, upload the scanned image of necessary documents.
  • Now, pay the application fee by the following modes:
  • Debit Card
  • Credit Card
  • Net banking 
  • Submit the IIMC 2024 application form by clicking on the 'Submit' tab.
  • Candidates will receive confirmation mail at their registered email address.
  • Download and print out the IIMC application form 2024.

preparation_tips.html_content:
The preparation tips of the IIMC entrance exam comprise the best books from which the candidates can study. IIMC entrance exam preparation tips also comprise solving past years question papers as this will help the candidates to get an idea about the type of questions that will be asked in the test. Apart from the books and sample papers, the other vital tips which the candidates can follow so that they can crack the IIMC entrance exam with ease are:

    • Revise thoroughly 

    • Complete the syllabus 

    • Remain focused 

    • Work hard 

    • Learn from your mistakes 

    • Draw a plan for the exam day

admit_card.html_content:
The admit card of IIMC 2024 will be issued in online mode. Candidates who have completed the application process could download the IIMC admit card 2024 by using their login credentials. The IIMC admit card 2024 mentions various important details such as the name of candidate, their photograph, signature, select course, address of the exam centre, exam time, date of exam and exam day guidelines. 

Before printing the admit card, candidates are advised to thoroughly check the IIMC 2024 admit card to ensure that all the details are correct. If candidates find any type of discrepancy in the IIMC admit card 2024 then they need to contact the authorities immediately. It is mandatory for candidates to carry their IIMC 2024 admit card along with valid ID proof with themselves to seek entry in the exam centre.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Candidates who are seeking in admission in various diploma courses offered by the institute are advised to check out the IIMC exam pattern 2024 available below. The IIMC 2024 exam pattern helps candidates to become familiar with the format and structure of the entrance exam. It provides all the details that candidates will find in the actual entrance exam. 

The exam pattern of IIMC 2024 mentions various details such as mode of the exam, total marks, number and type of questions that will be asked in the entrance exam. It must be noted that the IIMC exam pattern 2024 may differ for some programmes. Candidates can check the table given below to find out more about the IIMC exam pattern 2024.

faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for language programmes?
faqs.answer: Indian Institute of Mass Communication, Delhi has released the IIMC 2024 application form for language programmes at iimc.gov.in.

faqs.question: How can I apply for IIMC in Delhi?
faqs.answer: Candidates aiming to apply for IIMC should visit the official website to fill and submit the IIMC 2024 application form.

faqs.question: Does IIMC come under CUET?
faqs.answer: Indian Institute of Mass Communication, Delhi offers admissions for PG diploma courses through CUET PG 2024.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for IIMC?
faqs.answer: Candidates aiming to get admitted in IIMC should qualify in the CUET PG 2024, which is conducted by the National Testing Agency.

faqs.question: Who can apply for IIMC?
faqs.answer: Candidates who completed their bachelor's from any UGC recognised university should meet the IIMC eligibility criteria 2024 to be eligible for admission in Indian Institute of Mass Communication, New Delhi.

faqs.question: When will the IIMC 2024 registration begin?
faqs.answer: Indian Institute of Mass Communication has started the IIMCE 2024 registration process on February 1 in online mode for language programmes. Whereas, for diploma programmes IIMC has started the IIMC registration process 2024 through CUET PG on January 5, 2024. Students applying for language journalism courses (Odia, Marathi, Urdu) must complete the IIMC registration 2024 by May 31.

exam_name: ACJ Entrance Exam - Asian College of Journalism Entrance Examination

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Asian College of Journalism has started the ACJ 2024 application process in online mode at the official website - asianmedia.org.in. Candidates can fill and submit the ACJ application form 2024 till May 31. Aspirants should check the ACJ eligibility criteria before filling the application form. The ACJ 2024 application form has been made available in online and offline modes. 

The ACJ will release the admit card of ACJ entrance exam within a week of completion of the application process. ACJ will conduct the ACJ entrance exam 2024 in online, remote proctored mode. The ACJ entrance test 2024 will be followed by the interviews. ACJ will sent an email to the candidates issuing directions and information about the online entrance test. All candidates who have graduated or will be graduating in 2024 can apply for ACJ 2024 entrance exam. Based on the performance in the entrance exam, a list of shortlisted candidates are released for the interview process. The allotment is done according to the candidate’s score in the examination and interview.

What is ACJ Entrance Exam?

Asian College of Journalism conducts the ACJ 2024 entrance exam to facilitate admissions into its diverse range of postgraduate diploma courses. These courses encompass the PG Diploma in Journalism and the PG Diploma in Business and Financial Journalism (BFJ). The ACJ entrance exam is conducted as a computer-based test and consists of two parts: English language skills and general knowledge. Following the examination, shortlisted candidates are further evaluated through an online interview.

Contact Details - 

Asian College of Journalism,

Second Main Road

Taramani

Chennai - 600 113

Tamil Nadu, India

Phone no - 91-44-22542842-44/47/40
Email - asian_media@asianmedia.org.in

highlights.value: Asian College of Journalism Entrance Examination

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The eligibility criteria of ACJ 2024 consist of the conditions and requirements that the candidates need to meet to participate in the entrance examination. The application form of the ineligible candidates will be rejected; therefore, it is advised that the candidates check the ACJ 2024 eligibility criteria before applying. 

  • The candidates should have graduated in any discipline.
  • Those who are in their final year of graduation will also able to apply for ACJ entrance exam 2024.

application_process.html_content:
The ACJ application process was started in online and offline mode on its official website. Candidates can fill the application form of ACJ 2024 before the deadline in both online and offline mode i.e., they can fill and submit the application form online or download, fill and submit it through the post. 

Steps to fill Online ACJ 2024 Application Form

  • Login – The candidates will have to log in under the “Admissions” tab.
  • Filling of details – The required information will have to be filled by the candidates.
  • Uploading of documents – Candidates have to upload a scanned image of their photograph as per the specifications mentioned by the authorities.
  • Payment of application fee – The payment of application fee can be done in online (net banking/debit card/credit card) and offline mode (demand draft in favor of "Media Development Foundation", payable at Chennai). Behind the demand draft, the candidate’s full name, reference number, email address and mobile number should be present.

Steps to fill Offline ACJ Application Form 2024

Firstly, the candidates have to download and print out the application form of the ACJ entrance exam 2024. After filling up the required information, the candidates have to paste their photograph at the provided space. Payment of fees has to be done through the demand draft. The filled application form along with the demand draft has to be mailed to the following address:

“Registrar

Asian College of Journalism

Second Main Road,

(Behind M.S Swaminathan Research Foundation)

Taramani,

Chennai - 600 113, India”

Application Fee

One Programme – Rs. 2360

Both Programmes – Rs. 3540

admit_card.html_content: Candidates who have successfully completed the application process for the ACJ entrance exam will receive their admit cards via email. It is crucial for candidates to keep this email safe, as it contains important instructions for the ACJ online exam and interview. Only those candidates who have duly filled out and submitted their ACJ application forms will receive the email with examination information for the ACJ entrance exam. It is essential to carefully read and follow the instructions provided in the email to ensure a smooth and successful examination and interview process.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The exam pattern of ACJ 2024 gives details about the examination to the candidates to make them familiar with the pattern. By knowing the ACJ exam pattern, the candidates will be able to know various factors such as the type of questions asked, marking scheme, the mode of examination and more. The candidates have to qualify for the ACJ 2024 examination to have a chance for admissions into the institute. 

Exam Pattern of ACJ 2024

  • Mode of examination – Online
  • Purpose of exam – To test the analytical thinking and problem-solving skills of the candidates
  • Sections – In the first part, the candidates will be examined on their English language skills while in the second part, the general and current affairs knowledge of the candidates will be tested.
  • Duration of exam – English Language (2 Hours) General Knowledge (90 Minutes)
  • Marks for English Language section – 100 Marks
  • Marks for General Knowledge section – Current Affairs (60 – 65 Marks) Writing Ability, Analytical Thinking and Problem Solving Skills (35 - 40)

subjects.subject_name: General knowledge and awareness of current affairs

exam_name: GMCET - Global Media Common Entrance Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
GMCET 2024 - The Global Media Education Council will close GMCET registration 2024 for phase 7 on June 14 at gmcet.org. The GMCET phase 7 exam will be conducted on June 15. The authority will declare GMCET result 2024 for phase 7 on June 17 in online mode. Candidates can check the GMCET result 2024 for fifth phase by entering their details on the official portal - gmcet.prg. 

Applicants must check the GMCET eligibility criteria 2024 before applying for the GMCET exam 2024. For admissions to undergraduate programs like BA-JMC & BJMC, BMS (Bachelor of Media Studies), BMC (Bachelor of Mass Communication), BMM (Bachelor of Mass Media), BA (Media & Communication), BSc (Animation & Graphics) and BSc (Media Technologies), candidates must complete the GMCET application form online before its deadline. The GMCET is an institution and university level entrance test, which will be held in online mode. GMCET phase 6 exam 2024 was conducted on May 30.  The institution announced the GMCET 2204 result for phase 5 on April 29 in online mode.  

What is GMCET?

Global Media Common Entrance Test or GMCET is an all South Asia  that offers admission to the undergraduate media courses. This is an institution & university level entrance exam. The students will be assessed based on their communication skills and necessary analytics and logical reasoning. It is a 100-mark paper with 25 questions each testing English language and IQ, general knowledge of news and current affairs, entertainment media knowledge, brands and basic brand communication knowledge. The GMCET 2024 exam will be conducted in the online mode and can be taken from home. 

GMCET participating institutions 2024

The GMCET participating universities from India include Sharda University, Alliance University, National School of Journalism, Noida International University, Auro University, Presidency University, GITAM University, LNCT University, Ajeenkya D.Y. Patil University, Mody University, Jagran Lakecity University, NSHM Knowledge Campus, Centurion University, Vivekananda Global University, Invertis University, Bahra University and many more.

The entrance test is held for providing UG admission to courses such as BA-JMC and BJMC, BMS (Bachelor of Media Studies), BMC (Bachelor of Mass Communication), BMM (Bachelor of Mass Media), BA (Media & Communication), and BSc (Animation & Graphics).

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The candidates appearing for GMCET 2024 should check the eligibility criteria of their desired programmes and universities. As per the GMCET 2024 eligibility criteria, the candidates must have a minimum education qualification of higher secondary (10+2) or any equivalent education with a minimum aggregate of 50% for general category & 45% for SC/ST/OBC or should be appearing for the same in 2024. 

A candidate with a three or four-year diploma, from a recognized university approved by AICTE with a minimum of 50% marks can also apply.

application_process.html_content:
The GMEC will close the GMCET phase 7 application 2024 on June 14. Admissions to undergraduate programmes such as BA-JMC & BJMC, BMS (Bachelor of Media Studies), BMC (Bachelor of Mass Communication), BMM (Bachelor of Mass Media), BA (Media & Communication), BSc (Animation & Graphics) and BSc (Media Technologies) must be submitted online. Before submitting an application form, candidates must ensure they meet the prescribed eligibility requirements. Application fee of GMCET is Rs. 1000/-

Step 1 - Visit the official website - gmcet.org.

Step 2 - Enter details like program applied for, name, e-mail-id, mobile number, date of birth, and verification code displayed on the screen.  

Step 3 - After the registration is done an application ID and password will be generated. 

Step 4 - Use the application number and password to log-in. Now fill out the remaining application form. 

Step 5 - Upload scanned images of all the documents required. 

Step 6 - Select the examination centers- In order of the preference, select and enter the exam centres.

Step 7 - Now, enter the university and programme details.

Step 8 - Pay the applicable fees in online mode and take a printout of the application form.

admit_card.html_content: The Global Media Education Council (GMEC) issues the GMCET 2024 admit card in online mode at the official website. Candidates who have successfully applied for the GMCET entrance exam could download their GMCET admit card 2024 by using their login credentials. On the day of the entrance exam, candidates must carry the given below documents along with them. No candidate will be allowed to appear in GMCET 2024 without the requisite documents: Admit card for GMCET 2024 and a valid ID proof

counselling_process.html_content: Following the announcement of the results, all participating universities will begin the admissions process. Universities will first invite applications from candidates and then release cut-offs based on GMCET results. The candidates who clear the cut-off will be invited to the counselling round, where their documents will be reviewed and they can lock in their seats by paying the admission fee.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The duration of the GMCET exam is of one hour and has 100 multiple choice questions with a single correct answer. The exam consists of 100 marks and tests the student's ability in four sections, with multiple choice questions. The GMCET assesses basic knowledge of the applicant in these four areas, with 25 questions in each segment: (A) English Language & IQ; (B) General Knowledge of News & Current Affairs; (C) Entertainment Media Knowledge; and (D) Brands & Brand Communication Basic Knowledge.

GMCET Test Structure 2024

Total Questions

100 questions

Total marks

 100 marks

Total time

60 minutes

Paper Pattern

Multiple choice with only one correct answer

 Sections

 4 Sections of 25 Marks each

Marking Scheme

1 Mark for each correct answer

Negative Marking : No

English Language & IQ


25 Questions


General Knowledge of News & Current Affairs

25 Questions

Entertainment Media Knowledge

25 Questions

Brands & Brand Communication Basic Knowledge

25 Questions

subjects.subject_name: General knowledge of news and current affairs
Brands and brand communication basic knowledge

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at GMCET 2024 counselling
documents: Photocopies of all the original documents

faqs.question: When will the GMCET 2024 result be announced?
faqs.answer: The GMCET exam result 2024 for phase 7 will be declared on June 17 on the official website - gmcet.org.

faqs.question: Is there any negative marking in GMCET 2024 exam?
faqs.answer: No, there is not negative marking in GMCET exam. According to the marking scheme of GMCET, 1 mark will be awarded for each correct answer, and no marks will be deducted for any incorrect answer.

faqs.question: What is the duration of GMCET?
faqs.answer: The duration of GMCET is 60 minutes.

faqs.question: What kind of questions are asked in GMCET exam?
faqs.answer: Multiple choice questions has been asked in the GMCET exam.

faqs.question: What is the full for GMCET?
faqs.answer: Global Media Common Entrance Test is the full form of GMCET.

faqs.question: What is GMCET exam?
faqs.answer: Global Media Common Entrance Test, or GMCET, is an entrance exam for all South Asian Mass Communication programs conducted by GMEC starting in 2021. Candidates can take this exam to gain admission into journalism and mass communication courses across India.

faqs.question: When the GMCET 2024 exam will be held?
faqs.answer: The GMCET exam 2024 phase 7 will be conducted on June 15 in online mode. Applicants are given the time slots on their registered email address before the day of exam.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for GMCET?
faqs.answer: Applicants must have a minimum education qualification of Higher Secondary (10+2) or any equivalent Education with a minimum aggregate of 50% for General Category & 45% for SC/ST/OBC or should be appearing for the same in present year.

faqs.question: What is the application fee of GMCET?
faqs.answer: The GMCET 2024 application fee is Rs. 1000/-.

faqs.question: How to apply for GMCET 2024?
faqs.answer: Candidates are required to apply for GMCET 2024 on the official website at gmcet.org. The application forms must be filled in online mode.

faqs.question: When is last date to submit the GMCET 2024 application form?
faqs.answer: The last date to submit the GMCET phase 7 application form 2024 is June 14.
